jobActivity.title: RE: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Solution Architect ; Reference 43856
jobActivity.body:
RE: Microsoft Dynamics CRM Solution Architect ; Reference 43856 muhammet.atalay@bbtechnologies.co.uk x
chester.allen@lafosse.com via bounce.secureserver.net Attachments Thu, 18 Jul, 09:47 (2 days ago) to Muhammet
Hello,
Following your recent application for this role, we are writing to let you know that unfortunately you have not been successful this time.
While we understand that you wouldn't have applied to this role unless you felt you were a good match for it, please bear in mind that our assessment is relative to the profiles of the other applications we received.
For more detailed feedback on this application, or to talk about how we can help with your wider job search, please call us on 0207 932 2770, quoting the reference number 43856.
Please also visit our website where you can register for job alerts for similar roles.
You'll also find our Candidate Resources and FAQ page if you have any further questions or comments about this process.
Best Regards,
La Fosse Associates
Full Service Technology, Digital and Change Recruiter
Portland House, 5th Floor, Bressenden Place, London, SW1E 5BH switchboard: +44 (0)20 7932 1630 | www.lafosse.com | LinkedIn
